directions: Spread florets from 1 head of cauliflower out on a baking sheet and sprinkle with the spices, sesame oil, and olive oil.
Roast at 450° F for 20-25 minutes or until golden, fork tender, and crispy on the edges.
ingredients: 1 head of cauliflower, chopped into florets
title: Cinnamon Cauliflower
